UI_message_denied: Brothers in Arms denied by $attacker ($target was drown)!
UI_message_frags_5: $attacker is about to get Warrior award!
UI_message_frags_7: $attacker is about to get Radley-Walters award!
UI_message_frags_9: $attacker is about to get Pool award!
UI_message_frags_13: $attacker is about to get Raseiniai award!
UI_setting_allKill_tooltip: • None - only player frags are sounded. • Bigger - all frag capacities which are bigger than player's are sounded. • All - all frag capacities on arena are sounded.
UI_setting_battleTimer_text: Enable voice notifications about battle time
UI_setting_checkMedals_text: Notify about frag-related medals like Pool or Radley-Walters
UI_setting_checkMedals_tooltip: • OFF - medal notification disabled. • Player - only medals received by player will be notified. • Ally - only medals received by allies and player will be notified. • Enemy - only medals received by enemies will be notified. • All - all frag-related medals on arena will be notified.
UI_setting_colourBlind_tooltip: This setting changes the enemy text colour from red to purple.
UI_setting_delay_tooltip: Text message remains on screen for this amount of seconds before fading out.
UI_setting_disStand_tooltip: Disable default notifications about frags so that they do not overlap on modded sounds.
UI_setting_firstOption_tooltip: • First - only the first First Blood on arena will be notified. • Player - text message only appears if you drew the First Blood. • Ally - only the First Blood drown by allies and player will be notified. • Enemy - only the First Blood drown by enemies will be notified. • All - both ally and enemy First Bloods will be notified.
UI_setting_logging_tooltip: Allow the mod to overflow your python.log with debug information.
UI_setting_textColour_tooltip:
This colour will be applied to all mod's text messages.
Text examples:
UI_setting_textLength_text: Number of lines of in-battle text messages
UI_setting_textLength_tooltip: This is the maximum number of lines of text messages you will see in battle simultaneously. 0 completely disables the text messages.
UI_setting_textLock_tooltip: This setting controls whether you are able to move text window with a mouse or not.
